description:
Do you want to succeed on Fiverr? You can do it selling your skills at Fiverr.com 

Make a list of skills you have, create a Gig and start selling.

Become Level 2 seller in few months and take off your incomes. If you have a great Gig (which I will teach you how to do that), Fiverr may select you as a  Top Rated seller.

You just need a computer and internet connection. Your Gigs can become so successful that you can make a living of it   .

Managing your time as you want and working at home .

Learn how to:

  • Create your account and select a username
  • Explore your skills and select best Gigs for you
  • Create a Gig from the beginning to the end: title, description, tags, image, video, extras, delivery time, packages...
  • Manage your orders
  • Get more traffic and orders
  • Understand statistics
  • Get reviews
  • and much more....

Fiverr is a global online marketplace offering tasks and services, beginning at a cost of $5 per job performed, from which it gets its name. The site is primarily used by freelancerswho use Fiverr to offer services to customers worldwide. Currently, Fiverr lists more than three million services on the site that range between $5 and $500 (Wikipedia).

Buyers pay Fiverr for orders in advance. Sellers keep 80% of each Gig they sell and successfully deliver. For example, each $5 Gig you sell and successfully deliver, accredits your account with a net revenue of $4. Fiverr accredits sellers once an order is completed (Fiverr.com).
title: The success guide to FIVERR
